text:
Hello everyone,
Does anyone have clues on how to answer these questions please?
<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/APIs-Integrations/Webhook-note-creation-modification/m-p/409405#M40530>
Thanks in advance for any help
What's your go-to for translation services?
I’ve been trying to implement Smartling recently.  Sadly, I don’t think I’d recommend it.  They have a HubSpot integration, but it takes a lot of setup if you’re using custom modules.

Hi All,
 
Goal: Use HubSpot analytics for web traffic data.
 
So how to fetch/see the data for the HubSpot analytics? or is there any way to export the data of HubSpot analytics to SQL server.
 I have used Skyvia tool to export other data like companies, contacts, deals and etc.
Is there any other tool to export the analytics data?
Suggestion and help will be appreciated
